description:
Download and play Snood now! hâ€‹ttps://apps.apple.com/us/app/snood/id878752504 


Danny chats with actress and director/co-writer of Hulu's Happiest Season, the LGBTQ holiday romcom starring Kristen Stewart, Mackenzie David, Daniel Levy, and more! They also discuss her iconic roles in But I'm A Cheerleader, Veep, The Faculty, and more!


Interview starts at 4:24ish


PS Subscribe to Danny's spinoff podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, which is out now!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
